mapper.select: SELECT E.MEMBER_NO , E.KOREAN_NAME , E.SSN , E.ENGLISH_NAME , E.SPECIALITY , E.FAMILY_ORIGIN_ADDRESS , E.ADDRESS , E.PHONE , E.TEL , E.DEPARTMENT_PHONE , E.EMAIL , E.GENDER , E.NATIONAL , E.HIRE_DATE , E.ADDRESS_DETAIL , E.FAMILY_ORIGIN_ADDRESS_DETAIL , M.MEMBER_ID , J.JOB_NAME , D.DEPARTMENT_NAME , R.SALARY_STEP_BY_RANK FROM TBL_EMPLOYEE E JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON E.ID_NO = M.ID_NO JOIN TBL_JOB J ON E.COMPANY_NO = J.COMPANY_NO JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO JOIN TBL_EMP_SALARY_STEP R ON E.COMPANY_NO = R.COMPANY_NO WHERE E.ID_NO = #{ idNo } AND E.COMPANY_NO = #{ companyNo } AND J.JOB_NO = #{ jobNo } AND R.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo }
